* Title (English): Canadian Air and Precipitation Monitoring Network – Bonner Lake

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-12T15:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-10-12
* Tender Status (English): Expired
* Tender Status (French): Expiré

**Request for Tender Details**

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) issues this Request for Tender (RFT) for the provision of daily technical support services at the Canadian Air and Precipitation Monitoring Program (CAPMoN) Bonner Lake site in Ontario. The successful tenderer will be responsible for collecting, processing, and shipping precipitation and air samples from the site to the CAPMoN National Laboratory in Toronto, Ontario.

**Scope of Work**

The contractor will be required to perform the following tasks:

* Collect and process precipitation and air samples from the site in accordance with the CAPMoN Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs)
* Package and ship samples to the CAPMoN National Laboratory
* Perform routine checks and maintenance on monitoring equipment
* Read and record gauge data, diagnostic information, and perform troubleshooting and minor repairs as required

**Additional Requirements**

* The contractor must adhere to the Site Operations Reference Manuals and any amendments thereto
* Training will be provided by ECCC technical staff
* The contractor will need to work with various climatological and meteorological instruments
